ioformat.results

Class MultipleSetupsSummaryExtractor

  • java.lang.Object
    • ioformat.results.MultipleSetupsSummaryExtractor

  • public class MultipleSetupsSummaryExtractor
extends java.lang.Object
    If there were multiple experimental setups in different directories, this utility script extracts the best score for each algorithm and each dataset across multiple setups and also outputs the best k value and the setup for which it was reached.
